name: Fizzle (NeoTalon)
description:
This is a simple arcade game made for Weekly Hour Game Jam Week 10.

The goal is to move the white balls diagonally into the generator square.

Software: Game Maker Studio and SFXR

Development Time: 54 minutes and 48 seconds.

The game only requires a mouse to play.

My Highscore is 17, go ahead TRY to beat it.
